field.label: Out of Box Background Color for Boxed Version
Out of Box Background Image for Boxed Version
Addthis Pub ID
field.comment: You will get pub id from http://www.addthis.com

field.label: Demo Version
field.comment: Select the demo version, then import static blocks and cms pages.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
field.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Theme Primary Color
field.comment: This config will replace the #227ed1 color.

field.label: Theme Secondary Color
field.comment: For Demo Type 9 and 10 only

field.label: Background Color
field.comment: For Header Type 1 and 4 only

field.label: Text Color
field.comment: For Header Type 1 and 4 only

field.label: Text/Link Hover Color
field.comment: For Header Type 1 and 4 only

field.label: Icon Border Color
field.comment: For Header Type 5 only

field.label: Icon Background
field.comment: For Header Type 1 only

field.label: Icon Background Hover
field.comment: For Header Type 1 only

field.label: Background Color
field.comment: For Header Type 1 and 5 only

field.label: Nav Submenu Level One (For static and full width menu only)
Header Static Block
field.comment: For Header Type 1, 4, 5, 8, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14 and 15 only

field.label: Display Language Icons Before Label
field.comment:
After enable this setting you need to upload images in pub/media/language folder.
Image Size: 20px x 12px.
Image Name: .png

field.label: Static Width
field.comment: eg: 500px

field.label: Visible Menu Depth
field.comment: eg: 1, 2, 3, 4. For example, if you set this value to 3, only third level categories will be displayed (0 - disable limits)

field.label: Demo Version
field.comment: Select the footer style, then import static blocks.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Demo Version
field.comment: Select the footer style, then import static blocks.

field.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
field.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

field.label: Enable Slider for "Catalog New Products List" Widget
Enable Slider for "Catalog Products List" Widget
Display Wishlist and Compare Buttons on Hover
Enable
field.comment: Only work for simple, downloadable and virtual type products.

field.label: Message Text
field.comment: You can include %1 in string to display discount percentage.

field.comment: Please enter either attribute code or cms block identifier.
